ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: OT - Video cards, was:Equipment question
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think you can change the text color on the inventory popup, but you can change the color and opacity of that window using the /wincolor command. ...
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think you can change the text color on the inventory popup, but you
can change the color and opacity of that window using the /wincolor command.

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 14, 2001 8:59 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: OT - Video cards, was:Equipment question


At 06:50 AM 6/14/2001 -0700, you wrote:
>Does anyone know if you can change the
>text color of the inventory screen though? The
>white letters are murderous in Velious =) or any
>light colored area. I guess my next step is to
>invest in a 19" or 21" monitor now! eh?


Absor recently mentioned something about that - I'll have to look into it
for you.

Talies the Wanderer




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
